lancome-big-colour-lash-top-coat-01-fabu.title: Lancome Big Colour Lash Top Coat 01 Fabulous Gold 2.8mL Tester
lancome-big-colour-lash-top-coat-01-fabu.body:
Product Description

Add bright and flashy colours to your life depending on your mood! Fresh Green, Fearless Blue, Flirty Pink or Fabulous Gold, there lash top coats offer a coluorful Eye impact that lasts all day. Avoid monotony and reinvent yourself day after day. Numerous & Ultra Thin Nylon Loose Fibers fill gaps between lashes to provide visibly fuller lash fringe and extend lash length. Lightweight and smooth for clump-free lash shaping. Spiral-Slim brush encapsulates fibers and delivers the ideal dose on lashes for bigger volume and length.

  • The product comes in a tester box, never been used.
  • Ingredients: Aqua / Water, Styrene/Acrylates/Ammonium Methacrylate Copolymer, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Propylene Glycol, Alcohol Denat. lancome-labsolu-rouge-drama-ink-liquid-l.body:
Product Description


This Lancôme L’Absolu Rouge Drama Ink Liquid Lipstick is a liquid lipstick with a highly pigmented, comfortable and semi-matte formula. The ultra-thin, weightless lip ink leaves lips saturated in vibrant color for all-day wear, after just one swipe. The patented curved applicator ensures ultimate precision without a liner and won’t feather or bleed and is infused with Rose Extract, which leaves your lips feeling soft, nurtured, and comfortable all day long.


Ingredients: Aqua / Water / Eau, Dimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Isododecane, Butylene Glycol, Alcohol, Acrylates/polytrimethylsiloxymethacrylate Copolymer, Cetyl Peg/ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Alumina, Trimethyl Pentaphenyl Trisiloxane, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Peg/ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Magnesium Sulfate, Propylene Carbonate, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Phenoxyethanol, Ci 15850 / Red 7, Ci 15985 / Yellow 6 Lake, Ci 45410 / Red 28 Lake, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5 Lake, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Parfum / Fragrance

Product Description

Add bright and flashy colours to your life depending on your mood! Fresh Green, Fearless Blue, Flirty Pink or Fabulous Gold, there lash top coats offer a colourful eye impact that lasts all day. Get a colourful look! Add bright and flashy colours to your life depending on your mood! Fresh Green, Fearless Blue, Flirty Pink or Fabulous Gold, there lash top coats offer a coluorful Eye impact that lasts all day. Avoid monotony and reinvent yourself day after day. Numerous & Ultra Thin Nylon Loose Fibers fill gaps between lashes to provide visibly fuller lash fringe and extend lash length. Lightweight and smooth for clump-free lash shaping. Spiral-Slim brush encapsulates fibers and delivers the ideal dose on lashes for bigger volume and length. What Else You Need To Know: Lash Extensions in a bottle. Bigger Volume. Bigger Length. All Day Wear. How To Use: 1. One coat of Monsieur Big Mascara 2. Before mascara dries, apply Big Lash Extension Fibers and wait 30 seconds 3. Second Coat of Monsieur Big Mascara smudging.

lancome-labsolu-lacquer-gloss-344-ultra-.title: Lancome L'Absolu Lacquer Gloss 344 Ultra Rose Tester
lancome-labsolu-lacquer-gloss-344-ultra-.body:
Product Description


Buildable longwear, high shine lipcolor that feels ultra lightweight and hydrating on lips.

This innovative lip lacquer combines the comfort and shine of a gloss, the pigment of a lipstick and the lasting power of a stain. Our innovative oil in water emulsion is lightweight and non-sticky, providing up to 6H of wear. Enriched with glycerin, lips feel hydrated throughout the day. The high shine finish and vivid color payoff are buildable from sheer to full coverage in 1-2-3 coats.


Ingredients: Octyldodecanol,Aqua/ Water,Trimethylsiloxyphenyl Dimethicone, Ethylcellulose, Sorbitan Stearate, Glycerin, Alcohol, Tin Oxide, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Silica, Alumina, Aluminum Hydroxide, Magnesium Silicate, Sucrose Cocoate, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Parfum/ Fragrance [+/- May Contain Ci 15850/ Red 7, Ci 15985/ Yellow 6, Ci 17200/ Red 33, Ci 19140/ Yellow 5, Ci 42090/ Blue 1, Ci 45410/ Red 28, Ci 75470/ Carmine, Ci 77120/ Barium Sulfate, Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499/ Iron Oxides, Ci 77891/ Titanium Dioxide, Mica].

rose-milk-mist-soothing-re-hydrating-mis.title: Rose Milk Mist Soothing Re-Hydrating Mist Hyaluronic Acid + Rose Water 100ml
rose-milk-mist-soothing-re-hydrating-mis.body:
Product Description


What it is: A refreshing facial mist with hyaluronic acid and rose water that provides hydration for up to 24 hours, improves makeup results, and comforts skin.

Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture, and Fine Lines and Wrinkles

Formulation: Lightweight Liquid

Highlighted Ingredients:

- Hyaluronic Acid: Smooths and visibly plumps skin.

- Salicylic Acid: Smooths skin texture and reduces the appearance of pores.

- Rose Water: Soothes skin.

Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban, and contains less than one percent of synthetic fragrances.

What Else You Need to Know: This nurturing mist can be used as a toner, makeup setting spray, and a refreshing hydration boost. It transforms from a milky lotion into a light, makeup-friendly cloud that brightens skin with a dewy finish. Skin feels smooth and soft; makeup is refreshed, blends better, and feels more comfortable. Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Dermatologist-tested for safety.


Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Jojoba Esters, Chlorphenesin, Hydroxyacetophenone, Cellulose Gum, Cetearyl Glucoside, Polyglyceryl-3 Beeswax, Cetyl Alcohol, Honey, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Sweet Almond Oil, Tocopherol, Propanediol, Sodium Citrate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citric Acid, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Arginine, Carob Gum, Xanthan Gum, Geraniol, Farnesol, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Fragrance.


  • Disclaimer: Always Read The Label Use Only As Directed. For most up to date product ingredients, please refer to the ingredient list on your product package to ensure it is suitable to your personal use. 
  • Product Safety 
  • Note: The product comes in a tester box, never been used

lancome-labsolu-rouge-drama-ink-liquid-l.body:
Product Description


This Lancôme L’Absolu Rouge Drama Ink Liquid Lipstick is a liquid lipstick with a highly pigmented, comfortable and semi-matte formula. The ultra-thin, weightless lip ink leaves lips saturated in vibrant color for all-day wear, after just one swipe. The patented curved applicator ensures ultimate precision without a liner and won’t feather or bleed and is infused with Rose Extract, which leaves your lips feeling soft, nurtured, and comfortable all day long.


Ingredients: Aqua / Water / Eau, Dimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Isododecane, Butylene Glycol, Alcohol, Acrylates/polytrimethylsiloxymethacrylate Copolymer, Cetyl Peg/ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Trimethyl Pentaphenyl Trisiloxane, Alumina, Ci 15850 / Red 7, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Peg/ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Aluminum Hydroxide, Magnesium Sulfate, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Propylene Carbonate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Phenoxyethanol, Ci 15985 / Yellow 6 Lake, Ci 45410 / Red 28 Lake, Ci 77499 / Iron Oxides, Ci 19140 / Yellow 5 Lake, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Parfum / Fragrance

tester-drama-liqui-pencil-waterproof-caf.title: Tester Drama Liqui-Pencil Waterproof Cafe Noir Matte
tester-drama-liqui-pencil-waterproof-caf.body:
Product Description

A 24-hour, longwear, waterproof gel pencil liner that delivers dramatic vibrant color in just one stroke.

Drama Liqui-Pencil’s unique hybrid gel formula has the richly pigmented effect of a liquid eyeliner, with the ease of application of a pencil. The creamy texture is blendable when first applied, and once set, does not smudge, flake, fade or transfer.

Ingredients: Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Synthetic Wax, Isododecane, Ci 77491 / Iron Oxides, Ci 77499 / Iron Oxides, Ci 77492 / Iron Oxides, Polybutene, Mica, Ethylene/propylene Copolymer, Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Carnauba Wax / Cire De Carnauba, Silica Silylate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate

tester-advanced-genifique-hydrogel-melti.title: Tester Advanced Genifique Hydrogel Melting Mask
tester-advanced-genifique-hydrogel-melti.body:
Product Description

What it is:

A single sheet mask with the same amount of probiotic extract as a bottle of Advanced Génifique.

What it does:

A new type of sheet mask, the Hydrogel Melting Mask delivers instantly visible results with a concentrated formula for all skin types, ages, and ethnicities. The mask’s heat-sensitive hydrogel mesh melts into a liquid at skin temperature, releasing it potent active ingredients on contact. Skin is left looking visibly smoother, more plump, and radiant without any greasy or sticky feel. Use the mask three ways: to prep skin in just ten minutes before applying makeup; to restore radiance during the day or before a night out, or for 30 minutes before bed for firmer, more youthful skin by morning.

Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Bifida Ferment Lysate, Butylene Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sucrose, Lactobacillus Ferment, Tocopherol, Sodium Benzoate, Madecassoside, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Sodium Succinate, Phenoxyethanol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Adenosine, Faex Extract / Yeast Extract, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Arginine Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyacrylate-13, Allantoin, Polyisobutene, Polysorbate 20, Salicyloyl Phytosphingosine, Limonene, Pentylene Glycol, Linalool, Ceratonia Siliqua Gum / Carob Gum, Carrageenan, Sorbitan Isostearate, Disodium Edta, Potassium Chloride, Citronellol, Potassium Hydroxide, Methionine, Potassium Sorbate, Glycine, Fragrance.
